name: Heroes Arena
description: Welcome to Heroes Arena! Explore the Endless Arena, level up, buy new weapons, upgrade them, get a lot of loot on Loot Corridor, unlock player skins!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
